events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the product arrived with several scratches and seems to be faulty.
Based on the customer's description of scratches and faulty condition, this case is categorized under Product Defect.
The case has been assigned to support agent Jane Smith who handles product defect related issues.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I'm sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. Let's see how we can help.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and damaged areas, as well as the order number for verification?
Here are the pictures showing the scratches on the surface and the defect near the buttons. My order number is 123456.
Thank you for the photos and order details. We will send you a replacement product immediately and arrange for the damaged item to be picked up.
Thank you for the prompt response and solution. I appreciate the quick replacement offer and look forward to receiving the new product.
The replacement request has been processed and scheduled for shipment today. Your case will now be closed once the new item is delivered.
We are following up to ensure you have received the replacement product and that it is in good condition. Please let us know if you require any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we will assume the replacement was satisfactory. Your case regarding the defective product is now closed.
